channel.title: CVE Feed for wclovers -- WCFM Marketplace – Best Multivendor Marketplace for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wclovers -- WCFM Marketplace – Best Multivendor Marketplace for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2023-4960|2024-01-11T08:33:09.984Z -- wclovers -- wcfm%20marketplace%20%E2%80%93%20best%20multivendor%20marketplace%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WCFM Marketplace plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'wcfm_stores' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.6.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
